title: Dog Dollars - Run your dog walking business like a pro
text_content: Dog Dollars - Run your dog walking business like a pro Dog Dollars Features Pricing Demo Calculator Toggle theme Log in Start Free Trial Trusted by 500+ dog walking businesses Run your dog walking business like a pro Bookings, schedules, walkers, clients, payments, and report cards — all in one beautiful platform designed for growing pet care businesses. Start Free Trial Watch Demo 14-day free trial No credit card required Cancel anytime Everything you need to grow your business From scheduling to payments, we've got every aspect of your dog walking business covered. Smart Scheduling Schedule blocks, recurring bookings, and drag-and-drop calendar make managing your week effortless. Client Management Keep track of all your clients, their pets, preferences, and booking history in one place. Visit Report Cards Send beautiful report cards with photos, potty reports, and notes after every walk. Invoicing & Payments Automatic invoice generation and online payments make getting paid simple and fast. GPS Tracking Optional GPS tracking shows clients exactly where their pups went on their adventure. Photo Updates Snap and share photos during walks so pet parents never miss a moment. Smart Notifications Automated reminders for upcoming walks, payment due dates, and booking confirmations. Business Analytics Track revenue, walker performance, and client retention with powerful insights. Loved by pet care professionals See what dog walking businesses are saying about Dog Dollars. "Dog Dollars transformed my business. I went from juggling spreadsheets to managing 50+ clients effortlessly. The report cards alone have gotten me so many referrals!" SM Sarah Mitchell Owner, Pawsome Walks "The scheduling features save me hours every week. My team knows exactly where to be, and clients love the automatic updates. Absolute game-changer." DC David Chen Founder, Urban Paws Co. "As a walker, the mobile app is incredibly intuitive. Check-ins, photos, and notes take seconds. Pet parents always comment on how professional our service feels." ER Emily Rodriguez Lead Walker, Happy Tails Simple, transparent pricing Start free for 14 days. No credit card required.
